pkgmetadata.longdescription: Automatic Calibration by Evolutionary Multi Objective Algorithm // Multi-objective optimizer initially developed for the calibration of hydrological models. The algorithm is a hybrid of the MEAS algorithm (Efstratiadis and Koutsoyiannis (2005) doi:10.13140/RG.2.2.32963.81446) by using the directional search method based on the simplexes of the objective space and the epsilon-NGSA-II algorithm with the method of classification of the parameter vectors archiving management by epsilon- dominance (Reed and Devireddy doi:10.1142/9789812567796_0004).
